title: Miami Events
meta_title: Miami Events | Blog | Celino South Beach
meta_description: Events like Art Basel, Ultra Music Festival, and the South Beach Wine and Food Festival bring visitors from around the world to Miami. Discover Miami’s latest happenings, upcoming events, and more to make the most of your stay at Celino.
description: Are you the outdoorsy type? Hawai’i is a place for adventurers. Unique ecosystems make hikes, trails, snorkeling and watersports an unforgettable experience on the island. Read up on where to go and how to get there in the Outdoor Activities section of the Aston Waikiki  Beach blog.
